# Identify redundant alerts

Objective:

- Recognize alerts that report the same underlying condition.
- Understand how redundant alerts contribute to alert fatigue.
- Practice distinguishing signal duplication from signal diversity.

---
Requirements:

- A set of alerts from the same service and time window is provided.
- Alerts differ slightly in wording but may represent the same condition.
- The task must be completed fully offline.

---
Task Requirements:

- Review all provided alerts carefully.
- Identify which alerts are redundant or overlapping.
- Explain why these alerts do not add additional value.
- Record your assessment in **redundancy-assessment.md**.

---
Constraints:

- Do NOT run commands or scripts.
- Do NOT modify the alert data.
- Do NOT redesign alert rules.
- Do NOT perform root cause analysis.
- Focus on identifying redundancy only.
